value.title: Difference between duplicate and reference a query in Power Query

value.title: Download/ Export Power Query data to csv, excel or txt - Power BI Tips & Tricks #25
value.excerpt: Do you want to export your power query data? value.title: Age Calculation in Power BI using Power Query
value.excerpt: Power Query has a simple way of calculating the age. However, because DAX is the popular language in many calculations in Power BI, many are not aware of this function in Power Query. value.title: How to Create a Date or Calendar Table and Dimension in Power BI using Power Query
